/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on determining service incurrence of an injury, including
substantiating the circumstances of injuries
evaluating evidence of scars
processing examination reports of scars
considering evidence for combat-related disabilities
, and
definition of satisfactory evidence
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section A - Direct Service Connection (SC) and Service Incurrence of an Injury
citation: Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section A
